DOC.brief_summary: Motor control exercise demonstrate good option recovery chronic low back pain . The purpose study investigate effectiveness exercise program trunk stabilization perform stable unstable surface people nonspecific chronic low back pain ( NCLBP ) . Patients randomly divide 3 group ; control group receive placebo treatment shortwave ; stable group receive exercise protocol stabilize trunk stable surface unstable group receive exercise protocol perform unstable surface . We hypothesize unstable group present pain reduction functional improvement .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Exercise Trunk Stabilization Performed Stable Unstable Surfaces Chronic Low Back Pain .
DOC.criteria: Nonspecific low back pain Sedentary Previous low back pain last 6 month Traumatic , inflammatory , infectious tumour etiology Positive neurological finding ( leg pain ) Pregnancy Previous spine low limb surgery Contraindicated shortwaves aplication
